DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Pharmacokinetics AZD6140 After Single Dose Healthy Japanese Male Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase I , Single Centre , Open Study Assess Pharmacokinetics oral AZD6140 Single Dose Healthy Japanese Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 20 45 year inclusive Body mass index ( BMI=weight/height2 ) 18.0 27.0 kg/m2 inclusive Body weight 50.0 85.0 kg inclusive Provision write informed consent Clinically significant abnormality clinical chemistry , haematology urinalysis result judge investigator , positive result screen test serum hepatitis B surface antigen hepatitis C antibody , syphilis human immu Supine blood pressure > 150 mmHg systolic > 95 mmHg diastolic supine pulse > 90 beat per minute ( rest 10 minute ) Personal family history bleeding disorder , reasonable suspicion vascular malformation , include aneurysms Personal familial predisposition thrombotic disorder Clinically significant medical history , include psychiatric disorder severe allergy
